name: distill
content:
distill verb
(LIQUID)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to make a liquid stronger or purer by heating it until it changes to a gas and then cooling it so that it changes back into a liquid: Some strong alcoholic drinks such as whiskey are made by distilling.

distill verb
(INFORMATION)
[ T usually passive ] formal to get or show only the most important part of something: Over 80 hours of footage have been distilled into these 40 minutes.

chemistry to heat a liquid until it changes to a gas and then make it liquid again by cooling: distilled water/whiskey
To distill something said or written is to reduce it but keep the most important part: She distilled the report into a paragraph.
